external_references.description: Electricity Information Sharing and Analysis Center; SANS Industrial Control Systems 2016, March 18 Analysis of the Cyber Attack on the Ukranian Power Grid: Defense Use Case Retrieved. 2018/03/27

objects.description: In the Ukraine 2015 Incident, [Sandworm Team](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0034) used the credentials of valid accounts to interact with client applications and access employee workstations hosting HMI applications. (Citation: Electricity Information Sharing and Analysis Center; SANS Industrial Control Systems March 2016)(Citation: Dragos)
